name: Icarus (Madchazzer)
description:
Icarus is a single player, top down, dungeon crawler.

Scenario

Whilst on your way back home on a trading mission, you and your crew have been caught in a terrible storm that has resulted in you being swept away into a mountainous ruthless airspace, with no clear way out in sight. Your new mission and duty is to see your crew safely returned home and to navigate your way out of the bandit ridden mountains.

Gameplay

Navigate your way through the increasingly difficult levels whilst having to take down enemy ships by firing cannon balls, and avoiding storm clouds. There are also a few pickups within the levels such as balloons and health pickups, which will add to your end score.

Features

  • Take ages to find your way out
  • Depending on how far you click away from the ship, your cannon balls fire faster
  • Offline single player
  • Original pixel art
  • Easy replayability
